# Molecules in Strong Magnetic Field
There are some atoms that theoretically and practically do not form bonds in earthly environment. One of the example that we know is helium dimer, i.e. He~2~. If we consider (Molecular Orbital Theory)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Molecular_orbital_theory] we will see that He~2~ does not exist.
